title: Completely Remodeled and Bright 1 bdr Condo-Modern & Clean
map_address: Knapps Highway near Black Rock Turnpike
posting_body: ['Completely remodeled and beautiful 1 bedroom condo close to everything in a private, clean, quiet community in Fairfield CT!', 'See pics attached:', 'Beach and Parks Access (Run, swim, fish, walk, and enjoy the beauty of nature all around!', 'Kayaking, boating, hiking, and everything else you can imagine is within minutes to live a healthy and quality lifestyle!)', 'Train to NYC (~1 hr to Grand Central Terminal) New Train station within minutes!', 'Shopping within minutes of downtown Fairfield shops or nearby malls and shopping centers', 'Airports (Hartford OR JFK both can be reached in 1.5 hrs-', 'Westchester and Newark an option as well)', 'Close to Merrit Parkway and I-95', 'Private front VIP Parking with Security Cameras (additional guest spots also available on first come first serve policy)', 'Landscaping included', 'Snow Removal Included', 'Garbage and Recycling Disposal ON premise Included', 'Laundry Room on Site', 'Common Charges Included', 'Heat Included', 'Hot Water Included', 'Brand New Stainless Steel  Custom Built Kitchen with:', 'New Samsung Refridgerator with double filtered Ice Cubes and Water (never pay for water again!) and plenty of space', 'New Smart Wifi Samsung 5 burner stove with grill top and air fryer system.', 'New Samsung Microwave with custom-built carbon scrubber system', 'New Samsung 3-shelf dishwasher.', 'Filtered water systems installed at new sink and accessories.', 'New countertops, new cabinets, ton of storage spaces.', 'Raw foods Garbage disposal built in.', 'New WPC (wood planking composite) floors wall to wall.', 'New LED recessed fixtures and lighting throughout.', 'New GE air-conditioned units with an energy-efficient system.', 'New paint throughout the entire condo.', 'The beautiful town of Fairfield CT can be your new home!', 'Please call Sal at 617 285 5229', '****PLEASE CONFIRM OPEN HOUSE HOURS BETWEEN 3 PM  & 7 PM BY CALLING before', '*$125 credit and application fee (credited to the approved applicant)', '*1st, last, and 1-month security due at lease signing', '*direct listing by owner']
